snippet.title: Manual Intervention Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Manual Intervention is now for sale!

After 2 years of development, the solo developed indie game “Manual Intervention” is for sale. It is a tactical planet defence game, where the core game mechanic is to orbit around 3D planets and defend the ground colonies by destroying the incoming bombs.
